KEY FEATURES:

  • SSD Disk, Incredibly Fast I/O Speeds
  • Hard disks are protected by RAID 10 to prevent any data loss through hard disk failures

  • Free Dedicated IP Included with Every VPS
  • Full root/administrator access and RDP/VNC console access
  • KVM virtualization
  • Fully Automated setup within few seconds
  • Choose from a variety of linux and windows distributions.
  • 1 Click OS reload
  • Lowest ping times
  • 99.9% Uptime Guarantee!
  • Monthly/Quarterly/Yearly contracts to offer you the highest flexibility
  • Free setup
